NAME: profil
DESCRIPTION: Permet de voir votre profil ou celui d'un membre.
OPTION_USER_DESCRIPTION: L'utilisateur dont vous voulez voir le profil.

XINKO_DESCRIPTION: Xinko is a multipurpose bot that can help you create and manage your discord servers. She has a lot of features, such as moderation, fun, and much more. She is also very customizable, and you can change her language and much more.
